title: Handle Championship Trophy Presentation
description: After the championship game, a league official must coordinate the on-field trophy presentation ceremony.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the broadcast producer to schedule the ceremony.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ceremony is scheduled to happen immediately after the game ends.

tasks.description: Ensure the championship trophy is securely transported to the field.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trophy is in position for the ceremony.

tasks.description: Direct the winning team and league officials to the presentation stage.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary personnel are in place for the ceremony.
